ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | nfsymdif.1 | |- F/_ x A |

| 3 |  | #P_df-symdif | |- ( A (++) B ) = ( ( A \ B ) u. ( B \ A ) ) |
